testcaseName: Invalid dose 1 to dose 2 interval in midst of others.
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from previous dose (catch-up)
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child is administered a second dose of the Polio vaccine at an interval less than 4 weeks - 4 days from the first dose and a repeat dose of the vaccine at 4 weeks later that the dose is valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange: Rolled birth date forward to 2011 to ensure test was relevant to when ACIP recommendations were made.  Previous dates were before the ACIP recommendations were published.
